message.body: Tell everyone Alex was worried about being late and he was getting hungry so we had to leave.
Ok. Clayton just called. They want us in Destin July 20.
Told Jeff I took Alex a burger while he was getting dressed. Didn't feel like listening to him say that's why I started the grill bla bla bla
No idea what u r talking about. We r here
He asked if Alex got a burger. I said yes.
Hornes are not coming. Talked to Richard.
No joke. They just got home when I was leaving
How's it going?
Fine
Can I at least get a score or update in Alex?
We r ahead 2-1. Alex walked twice scored a run on stealing on over throws Same team we played yesterday
Grace ok?
Yes. Her and Marley are hanging out. She busted the big kids pi√±ata and got candy for Alex.
That's nice. U having fun?
Nope. I remember I don't like this party.
I thought u liked someone's husband. What about Matt and Brian
The tug boat guy was cool. Not here. Matt drunk and life of party.
Matt drunk??? How rare!! So unlike him. Hope Lauren remain sober.
Forgot to tell you. Fox NASCAR camera and cable snapped stopping the race and damaging cars when they fell. Sheila heard it on the radio
I saw it on phone. It hit Kyle Busch hahaha
Wow didn't hear about the fans. Dang

Bush said his "f***ing car is killed" got a cell phone and took pics of the damage. U think it was for insurance claim? Haha. 10 fans injured. 7 treated infield and release 3 taken to hospital for observation
Think it's scrapes and bruises
Another walk. Score tied
Idiot on first just stole second while Alex was on it causing him to get out after being forced to run to 3rd Coach T an Tom were pissed at kid
Not Juju?
Zach or brock i think
Game at 2:00 tomorrow
Take that back. For some unknown reason we have to play another inning.
Guess we had 35 seconds left and had to play. Must be ump time cuz I heard PA announce time Only 1 run ahead we went 3up 3 down. Now other teams turn.
Dammit
We lost
You coming back down or straight home?
Home. He's tired. Almost home
I'm bringing grace in then
